meanings.definition: The state of not being a member.
meanings.sent1: Her nonmembership in the club surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The nonmembership fee was much lower than expected.
meanings.sent3: His nonmembership in the secret society made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The nonmembership in the exclusive group felt like a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The nonmembership status granted her a unique perspective on the organization.

meanings.definition: The act of not joining or belonging to a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The nonmembership of the new employee raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent2: She chose nonmembership in protest of the company's policies.
meanings.sent3: His nonmembership in the team led to some playful teasing.
meanings.sent4: The nonmembership decision was a bold statement of independence.
meanings.sent5: The nonmembership stance allowed her to focus on personal growth.
